Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Striding
Augment.Description: Striding +20%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a 20% bonus to run speed.

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Greater Striding
Augment.Description: Striding +25%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a 25% bonus to run speed.

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Acid Resistance
Augment.Description: Acid Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Acid Resistance.

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Cold Resistance
Augment.Description: Cold Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Cold Resistance.

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Electricity Resistance
Augment.Description: Electric Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Electric Resistance.

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Fire Resistance
Augment.Description: Fire Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Sonic Resistance
Augment.Description: Sonic Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Sonic Resistance.

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Skill: Strength
Augment.Description: Exceptional Strength Skills +6

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Skill: Dexterity
Augment.Description: Exceptional Dexterity Skills +6

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Skill: Constitution
Augment.Description: Exceptional Constitution Skills +6

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Skill: Intelligence
Augment.Description: Exceptional Intelligence Skills +6

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Skill: Wisdom
Augment.Description: Exceptional Wisdom Skills +6

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Skill: Charisma
Augment.Description: Exceptional Charisma Skills +6

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Fortification
Augment.Description: Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Resistance
Augment.Description: Resistance +5: Passive: +5 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Improved False Life
Augment.Description: Improved False Life: This item grants the wearer +20 maximum health

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Greater False Life
Augment.Description: Greater False Life: This item grants the wearer +30 maximum health

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Fear
Augment.Description: Fearsome: This item causes those who strike the user to be overcome with terror, as from the Fear spell (DC 17)

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Featherfalling
Augment.Description: Feather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the descent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Deathward
Augment.Description: Deathblock: This effect grants immunity to all death spells and magical death effects. This includes immunity to Implosion, which can normally bypass the death immunity of Undead and Constructs.

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Lionheart
Augment.Description: Lionheart: The user of this item has a chance to gain the benefits of the Remove Fear spell when being hit in melee.

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Lesser Healing Amplification
Augment.Description: Healing Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by +20 (Exceptional bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.

Augment.Name: Eldritch Rune of Threat
Augment.Description: Incite +10: +10% Enhancement bonus to increased threat generation from melee damage
